mainHero.title: The Mummy Mindset Coach
mainHero.subtitle: Doula Services
mainHero.description: Your Compassionate Guide to Prenatal and Postpartum Care! ðŸŒŸ Our experienced doulas are here to support you through every step of your journey to motherhood. From personalized prenatal assistance to nurturing postpartum care, we provide a holistic approach to ensure you feel empowered and cherished during this transformative time. Explore our services, meet our dedicated team, and discover the nurturing care that awaits you and your growing family. Let us be your trusted companions on the beautiful adventure of pregnancy and beyond. Embrace the support you deserve with Our Doula Services.

primaryAction.href: mailto:info@themummymindsetcoach.com.au?subject=I would like to know about your services!

features.title: Our list of services
features.subtitle: How we care for you!
features.description: While doulas primarily provide services rather than physical products, there are complementary products that a doula-focused business might offer to enhance the overall experience for expectant and new mothers.

items.name: Prenatal Education and Counseling
items.description: Personalized childbirth education sessions. Assistance in creating birth plans and understanding various birthing options

items.name: Labor Support
items.description: Continuous emotional support during labor. Comfort measures and pain relief techniques. Advocacy for the mother's preferences and needs.

items.name: Postpartum Support
items.description: Emotional and physical support during the postpartum period. Assistance with breastfeeding and newborn care. Help with postpartum recovery and self-care.

items.name: Doula Packages
items.description: Comprehensive doula packages that may include both prenatal and postpartum support. Tailored services based on individual needs and preferences.

items.name: Virtual Doula Services
items.description: Online consultations and support for those unable to have in-person assistance. Virtual education sessions and check-ins.
